catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 501
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book; mostly text; image of a male figure seated amid text; first image shows a large grid of a city with bridges; chaotic montage of a battle scene; another groups of image featuring a man and woman reading and walking; also charts; gray cover with brown and green pinecones and needles; yellow and pink labels on front cover
markings: Marks on label on cover, in pencil: [204 / II] ; inside front cover, URC, in pencil: [II] ; Seal LRC of cover page: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 3
